sentences.sentence: Even before the brouhaha he had started to step back from running the team.
sentences.translation: 甚至是在此次闹得沸沸扬扬的事件之前，他就开始退居其后，不在管理车队事物。

sentences.sentence: This year Brouhaha International presents new performance work from around the world.
sentences.translation: 今年将展现新的世界各地的活动。

sentences.sentence: What I was contrasting that with is that a lot of the brouhaha with net neutrality is fairly theoretical.
sentences.translation: 我要指出的是，很多关于网络中立性的争论很大程度上都是“纸上谈兵”。
